thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Democrats will not use spending bill to force vote on guns: Senator Schumer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Democrats will not use spending bill to force vote on guns: Senator Schumer
text:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Senate Democrats will not try to use a spending bill to force a vote on measures to stop gun violence, Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer said on Tuesday.
FILE PHOTO - Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-NY) speaks at a news conference to announces Senate Democrats' gun safety proposals on Capitol Hill in Washington, U.S., March 1, 2018. REUTERS/Yuri Gripas Schumer said Democrats would attempt to force congressional action on the issue after a demonstration in Washington planned to take place later in March.
Reporting by Susan Cornwell; Writing by Makini Brice; Editing by Lisa Lambert
